attributes.action: Dealing Illegal Drugs to Young People under 18 Years of age
attributes.additional_details:
Illegal drugs have potential to be life changing and Young People are more vulnerable to the effects of illegal drugs and require more protection in law.

As a parent I am against those who would profit financially from dealing illegal drugs to Young People and call for mandatory custodial sentence/increased punishment for Dealers who sell illegal drugs to Young People under 18 years of age.
